snippet: A six-month investigation by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration found that Corizon Health Inc. failed to protect employees from violence at the jail complex.
abstract: Federal Labor Dept issues highest level of censure to Corizon Health Inc, New York City contractor that provides medical and mental health services to inmates at Rikers Island, for failing to protect employees from violence at the jail complex.
lead_paragraph: A six-month investigation by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration found that Corizon Health Inc. failed to protect employees from violence at the jail complex.

headline.main: Rikers Health Contractor Fined for Worker Assaults
headline.print_headline: Rikers Health Contractor Fined for Worker Assaults
